title: Thom Yorke and Stanley Donwood in conversation for Christie's

media:group.media:title: Thom Yorke and Stanley Donwood in conversation for Christie's
media:group.media:description:
Thom and Stanley talk about their work together and about Stanley's paintings from Kid A, auctioning at Christie's from now until the 19th September 2021.
https://onlineonly.christies.com/s/first-open-post-war-contemporary-art-online/lots/1869

The six paintings on auction will be open to public view at Christie's London from the 9th - 15h October, displayed alongside a collection of sketches and other works by Stanley and Thom.
Entrance is free and viewing times are:

Saturday, 9 October, 12-5pm
Sunday, 10 October, 12-5pm
Monday, 11 October, 9-5pm 
Tuesday, 12 October, 9-5pm
Wednesday, 13 October, 9-5pm
Thursday, 14 October, 9-5pm
Friday, 15 October, 9-5pm

https://kida-mnesia.com
